Text:
Excellent quality, best so far of the CD-size or smaller group I've tried (this's my third one). And the end credits are intact, lovely. Parseltongue subbed, too, wonderful. Thanks!

The originator's handle ("DiDee") briefly watermarks the rip a couple of times but only early on. Folder name annoyed VLC; removed the "[]" bits and VLC was happy, an easy fix.
Please tv team upload this movie in dual audio hindi-english,please and please tv team.
